Fluid, responsive grid

This demo uses a grid, which scales based on the width of the browser window, using "step 0" of a fluid typography scale generated with Utopia.

The gutter width scales from 16px at the smallest screen size of 320px to 24px at the largest screen size of 1440px. It does this fluidly without any media queries by interpolating the value of step 0 based on the viewport width. You can see the current width of the gutter and the viewport in the footer and the columns are overlaid in transparent red.

Responsive classes

One

This field element takes up fewer and fewer columns as the viewport gets bigger.
Here are the sizes:

  • Smallest: full width (span 12)
  • Small: span 8
  • Medium: span 4
  • Large: span 3
